TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FormattableString extends System.Object implements class System.IFormattable
Public MustInherit Class FormattableString Implements IFormattable
public ref class FormattableString abstract : IFormattable

summary.span: 表示复合格式字符串和要设置格式的自变量。

span.span: Represents a composite format string, along with the arguments to be formatted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 复合格式字符串由固定文本和索引占位符混和组成，其中索引占位符称为格式项，对应于列表中的对象。A composite format string consists of fixed text intermixed with indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to the objects in the list. 格式设置操作产生的结果字符串由原始固定文本和列表中对象的字符串表示形式混和组成。The formatting operation yields a result string that consists of the original fixed text intermixed with the string representation of the objects in the list. 复合格式设置受方法如， ，和。Composite formatting is supported by methods such as , , and . 有关复合格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information on composite formatting, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). A实例可能会导致从 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的内插字符串。A instance may result from an interpolated string in C# or Visual Basic.

summary.span: 获取要格式化的参数数量。

span.span: Gets the number of arguments to be formatted.

value.span: 要设置格式的参数的数目。

span.span: The number of arguments to be formatted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以从返回的对象数组中检索参数方法，或它们可以检索单独按索引号从方法。The arguments can be retrieved from the object array returned by the method, or they can be retrieved individually by index number from the method. 各个自变量的索引的范围从 0 到– 1。The indexes of individual arguments range from zero to – 1.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string Format { get; }
.property instance string Format
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Format As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Format { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Returns the composite format string.
The composite format string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 复合格式字符串由零个或多个固定文本混和组成，一个或多个格式项，通过用括号分隔索引号来指示 (例如， `{0}`)。A composite format string consists of zero or more runs of fixed text intermixed with one or more format items, which are indicated by an index number delimited with brackets (for example, `{0}`). 每个格式项的索引对应于遵循复合格式字符串的对象列表中的自变量。The index of each format item corresponds to an argument in an object list that follows the composite format string. 例如，在下面的语句：For example, in the following statement: [!code-csharp[Formatting.Composite#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Formatting.Composite/cs/Composite1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Formatting.Composite#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Formatting.Composite/vb/Composite1.vb#9)] 复合格式字符串是`"Name = {0}, hours = {1:hh}"`。the composite format string is `"Name = {0}, hours = {1:hh}"`.

summary.span: 返回一个对象数组，其中包含一个或多个要设置格式的对象。

span.span: Returns an object array that contains one or more objects to format.

returns.span: 一个对象数组，其中包含一个或多个要设置格式的对象。

span.span: An object array that contains one or more objects to format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端不应修改该数组的内容。Clients should not modify the contents of the array.

.method public static hidebysig string Invariant(class System.FormattableString formattable) cil managed
Public Shared Function Invariant (formattable As FormattableString) As String
public: static System::String ^ Invariant(FormattableString ^ formattable);

param.name: formattable
param.span: 要转换为结果字符串的对象。

span.span: The object to convert to a result string.

summary.span: 返回一个结果字符串，其参数可以通过固定区域性的约定格式化。

span.span: Returns a result string in which arguments are formatted by using the conventions of the invariant culture.

returns.span: 使用固定区域性的约定格式化当前实例生成的字符串。

span.span: The string that results from formatting the current instance by using the conventions of the invariant culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此静态方法可以通过以下语句导入在 C# 中：This static method can be imported in C# by the following statement: ```csharp using static System.FormattableString; ``` 作用域内，`import`指令内, 插的字符串可能进行了格式化使用固定区域性的约定的代码如下所示：Within the scope that `import` directive, an interpolated string may be formatted using the conventions of the invariant culture by code such as the following: ```csharp Invariant($"{{ lat = {latitude}; lon = {longitude} }}") ```

span.span: is .

returns.span: 使用 参数的约定格式化的字符串。

span.span: A string formatted using the conventions of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现中调用派生的类的实现。This implementation calls the derived class' implementation. 此成员是显式接口应用。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
